articles.title: Samsung to unveil Galaxy S25 Edge at Virtual Unpacked event on May 12
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Samsung will unveil the Galaxy S25 Edge at a Virtual Unpacked event on May 12. The Galaxy S25 Edge is a slim and lightweight smartphone, featuring a 6.7-inch AMOLED display, a 200-megapixel main lens, and a 12-megapixel ultra-wide lens. Interested buyers can reserve the phone now on Samsung's website and receive a $50 Samsung credit.

articles.title: Samsung Teases May 12 Event for Super-Slim Galaxy S25 Edge: How to Watch
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy S25 Edge, its thinnest Galaxy phone to date, with a virtual event scheduled for May 12 to reveal more details. The S25 Edge, part of the S25 series, will feature a 200-megapixel camera and enhanced mobile AI for photography.

articles.title: Samsung finally has a launch date for the Galaxy S25 Edge
articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.summary: Samsung is set to unveil the Galaxy S25 Edge at a virtual event on May 12th. The phone, despite its slim profile, will feature a 200-megapixel main camera, similar to the Galaxy S25 Ultra, and aims to merge flagship-level performance with superior portability. Samsung US is offering a $50 credit to those who reserve the phone now.

articles.title: Infatuated AI: Best NSFW AI Generator to Redefine Personalized Adult Imagery
articles.summary: Infatuated.ai has launched its new "nsfw ai generator," which uses AI to create hyper-personalized adult imagery. This new generator allows users to create unique, high-definition images based on their preferences and text prompts, offering a customizable platform. The company aims to redefine adult entertainment by leveraging AI to deliver safe, personalized experiences.

articles.title: Infatuated AI: Best NSFW AI Generator to Redefine Personalized Adult Imagery
articles.summary: Infatuated.ai launched its NSFW AI generator on May 7, 2025. The generator uses generative adversarial networks to create hyper-personalized adult imagery based on user text prompts, offering a customizable and private experience for consenting adults. It allows users to generate professional-grade visuals based on descriptions and scenarios.

articles.title: Amazon is selling a 'powerful' $159 DeWalt cordless wet-dry hand vacuum for $99, and shoppers say it's 'the best'
articles.author: Adam Reeder
articles.summary: DeWalt's wet-dry vacuum is currently on sale at Amazon. The product is a high-powered cleaning tool for handling big messes, adding to DeWalt's existing range of power tools.

articles.title: FIREHOOK® BLAZES INTO THE FUTURE WITH INSPIRED REBRAND
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Firehook, a premium cracker company, is debuting a new brand look across its national portfolio. The redesign emphasizes the Firehook name and incorporates hand-illustrated graphics to highlight the brand's heritage, simplicity, flavor, and premium ingredients.

articles.title: Google Search finally added an AI feature you might actually like
articles.summary: Google launched 'Simplify,' a new feature for Google Search within the Google app on iOS. Simplify uses Gemini AI to make complex text on webpages easier to understand without losing details.  This feature allows users to highlight text and tap a 'Simplify' icon to receive a simpler version, improving text understanding and information retention.

articles.title: Leaky Faucets Everywhere! We Have Our First Look at the Xbox Handheld
articles.author: Anthony Franklin II
articles.summary: A new Xbox handheld device, codenamed 'Project Kennan,' is potentially being developed by Microsoft. Leaked images suggest the device may resemble the ASUS ROG Ally 2, with a distinct Xbox button, but details about the operating system and launch date remain unknown.

articles.title: Introducing the Wix Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server for Seamless AI-Driven Web App Development  May. 7, 2025 21:00
articles.summary: Wix.com Ltd. launched the Wix Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server, which allows users to use natural language prompts to connect Wix's business functionality with AI tools. The Wix MCP Server provides access to a wide range of Wix's business solution functionalities, enabling users to manage their Wix-based business and generate code through AI assistants including Claude, Cursor, and Windsurf. Wix will demonstrate the capabilities of the Wix MCP Server for payments at Stripe Sessions.

articles.title: America's favorite cooking oil debuts "Caring Starts with Wesson" campaign celebrating new moms
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Wesson cooking oil is debuting a new advertisement campaign titled "Caring starts with Wesson," as an extension of the "It Starts with Wesson" brand platform. This integrated campaign targets millennial moms and celebrates new mothers, inspired by new Wesson consumer insights.

articles.title: 5 Best Aesop Fragrances of 2025 to Put Next to Your Bougie Hand Soap
articles.author: Leon Hedgepeth
articles.summary: Aesop has introduced five new fragrances: Hwyl Eau de Parfum inspired by Japanese Hinoki forests, Marrakech Intense Eau de Parfum inspired by Marrakech's spice markets, Eidesis Eau de Parfum from the Othertopias collection, Aurner Eau de Parfum inspired by the Old Norse verb 'to be adorned,' and Virēre Eau de Parfum inspired by Mediterranean orchards. Each fragrance offers a unique scent profile and aims to evoke a specific atmosphere or experience.

articles.title: Starbucks offers free cold foam! Here's how to get it
articles.author: Bibiana Palacios
articles.summary: Starbucks launched a new Brown Sugar Cream Cold Foam, featuring a light and silky texture with caramel-like sweetness. This new flavor pairs well with drinks like Cold Brew, Iced Chai, or Iced Flat White. The coffee chain is also offering free cold foam to Starbucks Rewards members from May 7 to May 11.

articles.title: New group-ordering delivery app aims to make hosting cheaper with convenient ‘payment splitting' feature
articles.author: Harvey Geh
articles.summary: Instacart has launched a new app called Fizz designed to revolutionize dinner parties. Fizz allows group ordering, payment splitting, and offers Snack Bucks for discounts on snacks and drinks. The app also integrates with platforms like Partiful and offers options for scheduled or ASAP delivery, with a flat $5 delivery fee.

articles.title: Up to 54% Off During Lenovo's Victoria Day Sale
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Lenovo is offering limited-time deals on its products during the Victoria Day Sale, running from May 12 to May 26. The sale features discounts on ThinkPad laptops, Yoga laptops, desktops, and accessories. My Lenovo Rewards members will receive exclusive early access and double rewards on tech purchases.

articles.title: Up to 54% Off During Lenovo's Victoria Day Sale
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Lenovo is offering limited-time deals on various products during its Victoria Day Sale, running from May 12-26. The sale includes discounts on ThinkPad laptops, Yoga 2-in-1s, Legion gaming systems, and other devices and accessories. My Lenovo Rewards members can unlock exclusive perks and earn double rewards on eligible purchases.

articles.title: Mother's Day Gifts for New Moms She'll Actually Appreciate
articles.summary: The article presents a curated selection of new products and services designed for new and expecting mothers. These include Kodak's Step Instant Smartphone Photo Printer for instant photo printing, Coterie's Newborn Gift Set containing essential baby items, and Hoka's Bondi 9 sneakers for ultimate comfort. Other products include FridaBaby's Mom Postpartum Recovery Essentials Kit and Bogg's Small Tote Bag.

articles.title: Soapless Soap? Why the Cleanest Skin Might Come Without the Suds
articles.author: Senior Content Strategist
articles.summary: Sans Savon, co-founded by Eli and Erica Halliwell, introduces soap-free cleansers as an alternative to traditional soaps. These cleansers utilize gentler surfactants, moisturizing oils, and cleansing clays to clean without stripping the skin's natural defenses, maintaining pH balance and supporting a healthy skin microbiome. These products are designed to be sustainable and beneficial for various skin types and for the planet.

articles.title: Dyson just released its most powerful hair dryer ever, in gorgeous colors
articles.author: Cailey Lindberg
articles.summary: Dyson has launched a new version of its Supersonic Hair Dryer in colors like Jasper Plum and Pink/Rose Gold. The company states that this version is the lightest and most powerful hair dryer they've ever released, featuring five attachments designed for precise drying, moisture retention, and a smooth finish.

articles.title: Google's AI Max aims to help businesses reach more relevant customers
articles.author: Temitayo Jaiyeola
articles.summary: Google has launched AI Max, a new AI-powered upgrade to its Search Ads platform, in global beta. AI Max enhances ad targeting and streamlines ad creation, helping businesses connect with more relevant customers. Early results show an average 14 percent increase in conversions at a similar cost-per-action for businesses using AI Max.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers 'so impressed with' bestselling £240 robot vacuum reduced to under £100 'I've bought three'
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: The Lefant M210P Robot Vacuum Cleaner is available on Amazon at a discounted price of £99.96, offering efficient cleaning with four modes and a 120-minute runtime. Other robot vacuums such as Shark Matrix Plus 2-in-1 Cordless Robot Vacuum Cleaner & Mop and EUFY X10 Pro Omni Robot Vacuum & Mop are also mentioned as alternatives.

articles.title: Smart, Stylish, and Seamless: Infinix is Redefining Daily Living with Its New AI-Powered Accessories
articles.author: Bellanaija
articles.summary: Infinix is introducing new AI-powered accessories. These accessories aim to redefine daily living with a smart and seamless experience.

articles.title: Walmart Unveils First ‘Store of the Future,' It's Quite a Change
articles.author: Evan Paul
articles.summary: Walmart has unveiled their 'store of the future,' a new retail store concept replacing the traditional store model.

articles.title: My Code Breaks New Ground at NewFronts, Ushering in its Next Chapter of Growth
articles.author: My Code
articles.summary: My Code is introducing new advancements, signifying a fresh stage of expansion. This implies introduction of new features or services related to My Code.

articles.title: Bashundhara tissue launches new '3-ply Bashundhara Toilet Tissue'
articles.author: Bangla News24.com
articles.summary: Bashundhara Tissue, part of the Bashundhara Group, introduced its new '3-ply Bashundhara Toilet Tissue' at a launch event in Dhaka. The new product offers three layers for enhanced softness, strength, and absorbency, targeting modern hygiene needs and setting a new standard in the tissue market.

articles.title: Hate bugs? Amazon has this effective bug zapper on sale for 40% off to eliminate them
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Flowtron Electric Bug Zapper on sale for $30, a 40% discount from its original price of $50. The Flowtron Bug Zapper uses UV light and mosquito attractant to eliminate insects within a 1/2 mile radius and requires minimal maintenance with UV bulb and octenol cartridge replacement.

articles.title: Saie released new summer shades of its viral blush and lip gloss. Here's where to find them
articles.author: Amanda Edelman
articles.summary: Saie has launched three new shades for its Glossybounce High-Shine Hydrating Lip Gloss Oil ($22) and Dew Blush Liquid Cream Blush ($25). The new blush shade is named Flirty. The Glossybounce shades include bubble (sheer nude-mauve), burst (bright watermelon), and splash (sheer coral papaya), while the Dew Blush shades include lady (mauve-nude), flirty (watermelon pink), and hottie (papaya coral).

articles.title: Best Tassimo machines 2025: Get the full buzz of the bean for an affordable price
articles.author: Stuart Pritchard
articles.summary: Bosch has introduced the Tassimo My Way 2 coffee machine, featuring a 1.3-liter capacity, Brita filter compatibility, and customizable settings for temperature, volume, and intensity. Users can save up to four profiles to quickly access preferred coffee combinations. The machine also features steam self-cleaning and a height-adjustable cup stand.

articles.title: Review: We tried the new Conair Infiniti Pro 2-in-1 Wet to Dry Hot Air Styler
articles.author: Nadia Albano
articles.summary: Conair is testing the new Infiniti Pro 2-in-1 Wet to Dry Hot Air Styler, which combines a round brush and blow-dryer. The tool features wet and dry modes and offers anti-frizz technology. Other dryer brushes to consider are Revlon Salon One-Step Hairdryer and Volumizer, Shark Smooth Style Heated Comb & Blow Dryer Brush and Babyliss Pro Nano-Titanium Large Oval Ionic Hot Air Brush

articles.title: Figma's AI: Site, App & Marketing Design Tools – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Figma is launching new AI-powered tools aimed at transforming design and web development. The new introductions include Figma Sites for AI-powered website creation, Figma Buzz for marketing asset creation using AI-generated images, and Figma Draw for advanced vector editing. Additionally, Figma introduces a content seat plan priced at $8 per month, providing access to Figma Buzz, Slides, FigJam, and Sites CMS.

articles.title: Mistral comes out swinging for enterprise AI customers with new Le Chat Enterprise, Medium 3 model
articles.summary: Mistral AI has launched Le Chat Enterprise, a unified AI assistant platform powered by its new Medium 3 model, targeting enterprise customers. Le Chat Enterprise offers features like enterprise search across private data sources, document libraries with auto-summary, custom connectors, and hybrid deployment options.

articles.title: Starbucks is giving away free cold foam this week: How to redeem the offer
articles.author: Gabe Hauari
articles.summary: Starbucks is introducing its new Brown Sugar Cream Cold Foam, described as having a "light and silky texture with a caramel-like sweetness." From May 7-11, Starbucks Rewards members in the U.S. and Canada can add any cold foam to a cold beverage for free, redeemable via the Starbucks app or in-store.

articles.title: Beauty Buzz: The 3 best beauty products we tried this week from Ardell, Shea Moisture, and Conair
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Shea Moisture has launched body wash formulations infused with African black soap, oats, aloe, and vitamin E. Chanel introduced the Camélia Futura Powder Blush Trio, a tricolour powder blush compact created in collaboration with global makeup artist Cécile Paravina.

articles.title: Beauty Buzz: The 3 best beauty products we tried this week from Ardell, Shea Moisture, and Conair
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Ardell has expanded its press-on faux lash line with new products like Mini Kits and a 1-Day Extensions D Curl Kit. Shea Moisture now offers its bestselling bar soaps in body wash formulations infused with African black soap. Chanel has released a limited-edition Camélia Futura Powder Blush Trio in collaboration with Cécile Paravina.

articles.title: Beauty Buzz: The 3 best beauty products we tried this week from Ardell, Shea Moisture, and Chanel
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Shea Moisture has introduced body wash formulations of its bestselling bar soaps, infused with ingredients like African black soap and Shea butter for gentle cleansing and hydration. Chanel has launched the Camélia Futura Powder Blush Trio, a limited-edition makeup compact featuring three shades for customizable color application with a matte finish.

articles.title: Your Netflix Home Screen Is Getting an AI Makeover
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Netflix is introducing a generative AI-powered search feature on iOS through an opt-in beta, enabling users to search using natural language. Additionally, Netflix is enhancing its homepage recommendations to be more responsive to users' moods and interests in real-time using AI.

articles.title: ‘False advertising': Customer ‘exposes' Little Caesars Pretzel Crust Pizza after asking the manager what's really in the crust
articles.author: Laiken Neumann
articles.summary: Little Caesars introduced a Stuffed Pretzel Crust pizza alongside the return of its Pretzel Crust Pizza in late March. The Pretzel Crust Pizza, first introduced in 2014, features a buttery-flavored, soft pretzel crust topped with cheddar cheese sauce, mozzarella, and muenster cheese.

articles.title: Panoplai Unveils Enterprise-Grade Interactive Data Repositories to Power Strategic Decision-Making
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Panoplai, an AI-powered consumer insights platform, launched the Panoverse, a new series of interactive data repositories for enterprises. This product update aims to help teams innovate faster and market more effectively.

articles.title: LUV Car Wash Expands Presence in Los Angeles Market with Latest Acquisition
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: LUV Car Wash expanded its presence in Los Angeles by acquiring Inglewood Express Car Wash. This acquisition allows LUV Car Wash to offer more modern, high-quality car washes across the region, representing a service update and expansion for the company.

articles.title: Tesco shoppers left baffled after spotting new 'strikingly similar' item on shelves
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: Heinz has launched a new 'Fish and Chips Sauce' in Tesco, positioned as a 'Tartare 2.0', featuring a vegan-friendly recipe with gherkins, onions, and herbs. The condiment is available at Tesco stores nationwide and online for £2.90.

articles.title: Blend Expands Product Suite with Business Deposit Account Opening
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Blend Labs has launched its Business Deposit Account Opening solution as part of their unified Consumer Banking Suite. This new solution aims to streamline and modernize the process of opening business deposit accounts for both consumers and banks. It offers features like income verification and integrations to help facilitate digital account opening.

articles.title: AI Enhances Packaging Design Creativity
articles.author: Anita Terry
articles.summary: IBEX Packaging uses AI-powered tools to enhance customer connections through improved packaging designs. By analyzing data, they create packaging that aims to be more personalized and memorable for customers. This approach reflects a strategic implementation of AI to refine and optimize their service offerings.

articles.title: Blend Expands Product Suite with Business Deposit Account Opening
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Blend Labs, Inc. launched its Business Deposit Account Opening solution. The solution is available as part of Blend's unified Consumer Banking Suite.

articles.title: Celebrity stylist-approved hair dryer now 25% off - get the same salon-quality blowouts as Hailey Bieber and Charli XCX
articles.author: NISHKA DHAWAN
articles.summary: Laifen is offering a limited-time 25% discount on the pink Laifen SE High-speed hair dryer as part of a Mother's Day sale. The hair dryer is known for its fast drying capabilities, heat protection features, and multiple settings suitable for various hair types.

articles.title: ‘Womanizer claims its Enhance vibrator has a 100% orgasm rate — we'll be the judge of that'
articles.author: Honey Wyatt
articles.summary: Womanizer launched Enhance, a 2-in-1 sex toy blending Pleasure Air Technology with We-Vibe vibrations. Testers claim 100% orgasm rate. It features 10 PAT modes, 10 vibration intensities, and 10 patterns, offering over 1,000 ways to use the product.

articles.title: Netflix's New App Makes It Easier to Find Stuff to Watch
articles.author: Dave Parrack
articles.summary: Netflix has launched a redesigned TV app experience to simplify the streaming service, featuring contextual information and real-time recommendations. Additionally, Netflix is testing generative AI-powered search using natural language for its mobile app on iOS, and a vertical feed with movie and TV show clips. The new TV experience will roll out globally starting on May 19.

articles.title: it smells like something you already have in your cupboard
articles.author: Senior Reporter
articles.summary: Arabiyat has launched a new perfume called Nyla, targeting women. The perfume, with notes of coconut, peach, white flowers, white musk and patchouli, is available as a 5ml sample for £4.99 and is being promoted by influencers on TikTok.

articles.title: Sony still makes phones.
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: The company is teasing the launch of its new product, the Xperia 1 VII, scheduled for May 13th in Japan. The teaser highlights a familiar design and some Alpha camera features. Last year's model never launched in the US.

articles.title: Beijing Hyundai ELEXIO: 700km Range, Huawei ADAS – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Beijing Hyundai is launching the ELEXIO, a new electric crossover, in the Chinese EV market. The ELEXIO features a range of up to 700 kilometers, fast charging capabilities, a 27-inch HUD, and Huawei's ADAS, aiming to compete with established EV models like the Kia EV5 and Tesla Model Y.

articles.title: Barcelona bonus bites: Vici turns SEG heads with black ant-topped salmon
articles.summary: Viciunai Group (Vici) debuted its salmon loin with black ants, which won an award, at the Seafood Expo Global. While not yet in production, Vici also showcased a salmon with truffles product that they anticipate launching sooner, possibly around Christmas. The company plans to start producing these products once their new sample factory is fully operational next year.

articles.title: Best 7kg washing machine: Top 10 options from Samsung, LG, Godrej and more brands on Amazon Sale 2025
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: The article features the introduction of various 7kg washing machines from brands like Samsung, LG, Godrej, Whirlpool, and IFB, available during the Amazon Summer Sale 2025. These models offer features like EcoBubble Technology, Hygiene Steam, Direct Drive motors, AI-powered fabric detection, and various wash programs, catering to different laundry needs and household sizes.

articles.title: Get a Samsung Galaxy tablet for £3 a month in rare deal that beats brand's own price
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Sky has launched a new deal offering the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 tablet for £3 a month. The tablet features a large, vibrant display, up to 4GB of RAM, and 64GB of storage.

articles.title: PROSPERITY BRANDS® LAUNCHES NEW WEBSITE AND PUBLICLY DEBUTS AS A GLOBAL FAMILY OF FRANCHISE BRANDS WITH A MISSION-DRIVEN FOCUS
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Prosperity Brands, the parent company of BNI, CorporateConnections, and Scion Social, launched its new website, prosperitybrands.com, marking its public debut and establishing a new digital presence.

articles.title: Volvo XC70 returns from the dead, but it's no longer a wagon
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Volvo plans to launch the XC70, an all-new plug-in hybrid model, in 2025. This launch demonstrates Volvo's adaptation to local market needs and drivetrain preferences.

articles.title: Volvo XC70 returns from the dead, but is it a wagon?
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Volvo plans to launch an all-new plug-in hybrid model, the XC70, in 2025. This initiative responds to changing drivetrain preferences and adapts to local market needs, as stated by Mr. Samuelsson.

articles.title: Branston adds Chilli Piccalilli to ‘re-engage' pickle fans
articles.author: Niamh Leonard-Bedwell
articles.summary: Branston has launched Chilli Piccalilli, a new flavor extension, in Tesco, Amazon, Ocado, and soon Morrisons. PepsiCo introduced Extra Flamin' Hot variants to Doritos, Walkers Max, and Wotsits Crunchy, and launched Doritos Dinamita. Grupo Bimbo's Takis launched Blue Heat tortilla chips in the UK, and PepsiCo relaunched Cheetos with a Fiery Jalapeño & Cheese variant.

articles.title: Local Digital Media Company Ranks High in Southeast Region
articles.author: Site Staff
articles.summary: Performance First Digital launched "One Click" in March 2025, an AI-powered advertising platform that automates and simplifies digital advertising for businesses. The platform offers features like hyper-personalization, real-time data analysis, and dynamic content creation to deliver targeted campaigns across various channels, consolidating media buying across platforms like Google and Facebook.

articles.title: Albertsons debuts e-commerce platform for businesses
articles.author: Peyton Bigora
articles.summary: Albertsons has launched a new business e-commerce platform, branded as Albertsons Business and Safeway Business for respective banners, to provide local businesses with grocery and other necessities. This platform offers features such as tax-exempt orders, flexible payment options, and same-day delivery.

articles.title: Why Janitor AI is the Future of NSFW Character AI and Bot 18+ Chat
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: NSFW character AI platforms such as Janitor AI and CrushOn.AI offer personalized AI companions with customizable personalities and interactions. These platforms provide users with a judgment-free environment to explore their fantasies and create unique digital relationships. Future developments include even more personalized interactions, integration with VR/AR, and shared virtual worlds.

articles.title: One household item will remove 'any stains' from carpets in 10 minutes
articles.author: Angela Patrone
articles.summary: Lynsey Crombie suggests using shaving foam as an inexpensive stain remover for carpets and mattresses. The shaving foam should be gently rubbed into the stain with warm water and a soft brush or cloth, left for 10 minutes, and then rinsed away. Users have reported success with this method for various stains, including milk, mud, soda, and even nail varnish.

articles.title: Quick Clean Routines: The Libman Company Offers Simple Tips for Staying Ahead of the Mess
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: The Libman Company launched the Libman Lightning Spin Mop™ System. The Libman Company has been producing cleaning tools since 1896.

articles.title: Fabio Baum: 'It's essential to reflect local fashion'
articles.summary: Zalando officially launched in Luxembourg with a dedicated app and shop, enhancing the customer experience through optimized product selection, new services like relay point delivery/returns, and an expanded product range. The launch also introduces Zalando Plus, a loyalty program offering benefits like faster premium delivery, previously a paid service but now free based on customer commitment.

articles.title: De'Longhi Rivelia Espresso Machine review: Elevated one-touch coffee
articles.author: Kate Mendonca
articles.summary: De'Longhi has launched the Rivelia Espresso Machine, the newest addition to their automated espresso machine lineup. This machine offers pre-programmed drinks for novices and advanced customization settings for experienced users, providing a versatile coffee experience.

articles.title: Not just a black screen anymore, Vision AI is a quantum leap for us: Samsung India's VD business head Viplesh Dang explains how the company's 2025 range of televisions is changing
articles.author: Abhinav Kaustubh
articles.summary: Samsung launched its 2025 Vision AI TV lineup, including Neo QLED 8K, Neo QLED 4K, OLED, and QLED models, featuring AI Mode, AI Experience, and Multi-Device Connectivity. The TVs incorporate the NQ8 AI Gen3 processor and offer features like universal gestures and generative wallpapers. Pricing starts at Rs 49,490 for 43-inch models and goes up to Rs 11 lakhs for 100-inch displays.

articles.title: Amazon launches new service selling items for as low as £1 - but there's a catch
articles.author: Flanagan
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a new service called "Haul" on its website, offering customers access to ultra-low-priced products across fashion, home, and lifestyle categories, primarily through the Amazon app. The service aims to rival competitors and is currently being trialed before being rolled out to all Amazon customers in the coming weeks, with free delivery available on orders over £15.

articles.title: Boost Mobile expands 5G handset offering with latest moto g
articles.summary: Boost Mobile has expanded its 5G handset offerings by launching the moto g 5G smartphone from Motorola. New Boost Mobile customers can acquire the device for free when porting their existing phone number and signing up for the Unlimited+ plan.

articles.title: அன்னையர் தின ஸ்பெஷல்.. பிஎஸ்என்எல் சிறப்பு ரீசார்ஜ் திட்டம்!
articles.summary: BSNL announced special Mother's Day offers for its prepaid mobile customers. This provides a new service to the customers.

articles.title: Netflix Unveils First Look At New Homepage Design
articles.author: Lucas Manfredi
articles.summary: The streamer is launching updated mobile features, including a video feed and generative AI-powered search. The AI-powered search is done in collaboration with OpenAI.

articles.title: Netflix to revamp TV app interface, launch AI-powered search for iOS users
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Netflix is planning to revamp its TV app interface by redesigning the homepage and repositioning search and "My List" options. Additionally, Netflix will introduce generative AI to its iOS mobile platform, enabling users to search for content using natural language. The company also plans to test a vertical feed showcasing clips of shows and movies on its mobile experience.

articles.title: OpenAI's content chief says ChatGPT Search is helping newsmakers, reducing reliance on 'ten blue links'
articles.summary: OpenAI's ChatGPT Search, a new product, enables users to perform detailed searches and receive contextual answers from various online sources. The search tool has become a significant feature within ChatGPT, offering accurate and useful results, and assisting journalists in reaching audiences.

articles.title: WATCH: MTN's smart data strategy
articles.summary: MTN plans to offer smartphones for R99 to over 1 million prepaid customers. This strategy aims to increase the adoption of MTN's data services among its user base.

articles.title: Netflix debuts its generative AI-powered search tool
articles.author: Lauren Forristal
articles.summary: Netflix has launched a new AI-powered search experience that utilizes OpenAI's ChatGPT, allowing users to find content using natural language. The feature is initially rolling out to iOS users as an opt-in beta, with some subscribers in Australia and New Zealand already having access. Additionally, Netflix plans to use generative AI to update title cards in subscribers' preferred languages.

articles.title: Saucy! Heinz claims to have invented a brand new 'fish and chip sauce' - but shoppers say it is an old favourite under a different name
articles.author: TOM LAWRENCE
articles.summary: Heinz has introduced a new 'Fish & Chips Sauce,' marketed as 'Tartare 2.0,' featuring gherkins, dill, parsley, and mustard. Available in Tesco for £3.40 (400g), this new condiment targets Britons and is designed to complement fish dishes, especially fish and chips, and caters to vegans as it does not contain egg yolks like the traditional tartare sauce.

articles.title: New AI-powered Google tool helps local African businesses reach more customers
articles.author: Ganiyu Mubarak
articles.summary: Google has announced the global beta rollout of AI Max for Search Campaigns, an upgrade to its Search Ads platform. AI Max uses artificial intelligence to improve how ads are shown, helping businesses connect with a larger customer base. The feature suite includes search term matching, dynamic text customization, final URL expansion and control settings.

articles.title: ElevenLabs Introduces Open-Source Audio Starter Kit To Add Sound Effects, Conversational AI and More to Products; Check Details
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: ElevenLabs launched the open-source Next.js Audio Starter Kit on May 7, 2025, to enable developers to easily integrate audio and voice features into their products. The kit, built with the ElevenLabs SDK, Next.js, shadcn/ui, and Tailwind CSS v4, supports Text to Speech, Speech to Text, Sound Effects, and Conversational AI functionalities.

articles.title: 'I've been using Ninja's Woodfire and it has blown me away - now it's on sale'
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Woodfire Electric BBQ Grill & Smoker, an outdoor cooking device that can grill, smoke, roast, and bake. It uses wood pellets for a smoky flavor and features a heating element at the bottom and top of the lid. The Woodfire Electric BBQ Grill & Smoker is on sale for £50 off for a limited time.

articles.title: The Xbox handheld just leaked, and it looks more like the PlayStation Portal than I was expecting
articles.summary: Leaked images reveal a potential new Xbox handheld device in two versions. The black version features a Ryzen Z2 Extreme chip and 64GB RAM, while the white version allegedly uses a custom AMD Ryzen Aerith Plus APU. The device information was taken from an FCC listing linked to Indonesian device certification.

articles.title: Microsoft Surface Pro (12 Inch) and Surface Laptop (13 Inch): Specs, Price, Features, Release Date
articles.summary: Microsoft has introduced new Surface Laptop and Surface Pro models. These new laptops are more affordable than the 2024 Surface Laptop (7th Edition) and Surface Pro (11th Edition), with a starting price of $799 for the Surface Pro (12 Inch) and $899 for the Surface Laptop (13 Inch). These new models are the thinnest and lightest Surface devices yet, with the longest battery life.

articles.title: Juniper Networks Delivers the Next Era of AI-Native Innovation with Expanded Client-to-Cloud Insights and Self-Driving Network™ Operations
articles.summary: Juniper Networks announced key innovations in its Mist AI-native networking platform. These innovations include Enhanced Marvis Minis, a new Marvis Actions self-driving dashboard, and an enhanced Marvis mobile client to enhance user experience from client-to-cloud.

articles.title: Amazon launches ‘Bazaar' in Saudi Arabia for low-cast trendy shopping
articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Amazon Bazaar, a new budget-friendly shopping feature on its Saudi Arabia platform, offering low-cost fashion, home, and lifestyle products. This new in-app experience showcases thousands of items mostly priced at SAR25 or less and provides savings on larger orders.

articles.title: Why could it be that you aren't satisfied with your fixed internet deal?
articles.summary: Eltrona is offering its GiGA Internet service with a promotional deal of three months free, then €49 per month. The service is a fixed internet package with no hidden costs and no long-term commitment, along with local customer service.

articles.title: What users really want from their internet subscriptions
articles.summary: Eltrona is promoting its GiGA Internet service with an offer of three months free, followed by a fixed price of €49 per month. This offer has no commitment and no hidden charges, thus providing users with complete freedom. This is an ideal opportunity to discover a high-performance broadband connection.

articles.title: 'I visited the new Home Bargains café for breakfast and was left astounded'
articles.author: Alan Johnson
articles.summary: Home Bargains has introduced cafes in over 30 of its larger stores across the UK, offering budget-friendly menu items. The menu includes breakfast rolls from £1.99, toasties, paninis, wraps, and focaccia all at £2.75. Pastries are available for 89p each, doughnuts for 59p, and sausage rolls for 50p.

articles.title: FancyTech Secures Series B+ Funding to Enhance AI-Driven Personalized Content Solutions Across Thailand and Southeast Asia
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: FancyTech, an AI startup, has closed its Series B+ funding round to expand globally, focusing on Thailand. FancyTech partners with Thai retail and banking businesses to deliver hyper-personalized content experiences using AI, enabling clients to improve marketing efficiency and campaign ROI. The company aims to leverage Thailand's creative economy to build a global AI content supply chain.

articles.title: Elon Musk's Memphis data center has a pollution problem that's not going away anytime soon
articles.summary: eBay is introducing a new AI-powered shopping agent to guide users through its online listings using conversational prompts and iterative reasoning. Wayfair is also using generative AI to create imagery and inspiration for shoppers who may not know exactly what they want.

articles.title: What is Vulcan, Amazon's latest robot with a sense of touch?
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Amazon introduced Vulcan, a new robot equipped with a sense of touch, at the 'Delivering the Future' event in Dortmund, Germany. Vulcan is designed to assist human employees by sorting items for storage and preparing them for delivery and it can pick and stow approximately 75 per cent of various types of items at the fulfillment centres. The company plans to deploy Vulcan worldwide and leverage its ability to understand contact with objects to improve operational efficiency.

articles.title: Why every company is hitting ‘Ctrl+B' on its logo
articles.author: James I. Bowie
articles.summary: Amazon, Walmart, and OpenAI have updated their logos and wordmarks with a "bold" refresh. Amazon's logo received a "deeper and more emphatic smile," according to the design agency Koto. Walmart's new spark was called 'softer, warmer, and more friendly' by logo guru Armin Vit.

articles.title: Heinz rebrands Tartare sauce as ‘Fish & Chips Sauce'
articles.author: Team Upday
articles.summary: Heinz has launched a new 'Fish & Chips Sauce', a rebranded version of the classic Tartare sauce, positioning it as a 'Tartare 2.0'. The new sauce contains gherkins, dill, salt, parsley, and mustard, and is targeted as the go-to condiment for fish dinners, especially fish & chips.

articles.title: Amazon unveils robot with ‘a sense of touch'
articles.author: PA News Agency
articles.summary: Amazon has unveiled its first robot that it says has a sense of touch. This robot represents a fundamental leap forward in robotics.

articles.title: Samsung launches Vision AI-Powered NeoQLED, QLED, OLED and Frame TV models in India
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung India introduced its 2025 premium television lineup featuring Vision AI technology across Neo QLED 8K, Neo QLED 4K, OLED, QLED, and The Frame models. The flagship Neo QLED 8K QN950F is powered by the NQ8 AI Gen3 Processor and includes 8K AI Upscaling Pro. Pre-orders begin May 7, 2025, with pricing starting at Rs 272,990 for Neo QLED 8K and Rs 89,990 for Neo QLED 4K, alongside various pre-order benefits.

articles.title: Amazon unveils robot with ‘a sense of touch'
articles.author: Team Upday
articles.summary: Amazon has introduced Project Vulcan, its first robot with a sense of touch, featuring force feedback sensors. This new robot is designed to work alongside employees in warehouses and fulfillment centers, handling approximately three-quarters of the products offered by Amazon. Vulcan's capability represents a fundamental leap in robotics.

articles.title: 30 Helpful Products For Anyone Who Shares A Kitchen With Roommates
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article highlights several new products available on Amazon designed to simplify household chores and improve organization. These include cleaning solutions like The Pink Stuff, organizational tools such as the Deli ProKeeper and Bread Buddy dispenser, and innovative gadgets like the FryAway cooking oil solidifier, stain-removing nontoxic cleaning cups, Green Gobbler Drain Clog Dissolver and more. These items provide efficient solutions to common household problems.

articles.title: Shark's Cordless Wet-Dry Vacuum Is $100 Off at Amazon
articles.author: Clint Davis
articles.summary: Shark is launching the HydroVac MessMaster, a cordless wet-dry vacuum cleaner available on Amazon for $200 (originally $300), which vacuums and mops simultaneously and self-cleans. The HydroVac features a stain boost mode and separate clean and dirty water tanks, simplifying floor cleaning for smaller homes.

articles.title: Norwegian Startup Aida Turns Heads at UK Business Expos with Designer-Led AI Marketing Platform
articles.author: K. Mar Hauksson
articles.summary: Aida, an Oslo-based startup, has launched its AI-powered marketing platform in public beta and showcased it at business events in the UK. The platform, designed to help small teams with organic content creation and brand consistency, integrates AI-driven content generation with creative workflows and received positive feedback from attendees.

articles.title: Huawei set to unveil new wearables
articles.author: AKANI CHAUKE
articles.summary: Huawei will unveil new wearables at its Innovative Product Launch on May 15 in Berlin. The lineup includes the next generation of Huawei's Fit watch series (Fit 4 and Fit 4 Pro) and the Huawei Watch 5. The Watch 5 is speculated to have an all-in-one sensor and the enhanced Huawei TruSense System.

articles.title: Revolutionizing Ad Revenue for Short Term Property Owners
articles.summary: AdVision Connect, a new platform, is launching to help property managers monetize guest experiences through smart TVs and Android devices. This system offers features like branded welcome messages, local recommendations, and dynamic advertising controlled via a cloud-based dashboard. With a freemium model, AdVision Connect enables properties to generate revenue without additional hardware investments.

articles.title: 2025 Mazda CX-60 gets mechanical upgrades, but here's what's missing
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: Mazda Australia has announced that Connected Services will not be available on the forthcoming CX-60. This is because the CX-60 is an update to an existing model and Connected Services were launched prior to this update.

articles.title: Served expands RTD lineup with four new cocktails
articles.author: James Beeson
articles.summary: Served, a Heineken-backed RTD brand, has expanded its cocktail lineup with Spicy Margarita, Margarita, Passion Fruit Martini, and Mojito, now available at Ocado and Morrisons. This follows the February launch of Lychee Martini, Strawberry Daiquiri, Espresso Martini, and Cosmopolitan. Additionally, Served has increased distribution in Sainsbury's for Mojito, Margarita, and Passion Fruit Martini and made its international debut in Ireland.

articles.title: The new River Island dress shoppers 'had 20 years ago' but say 'love it'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: River Island has launched a new "Sleeveless Ruffle Mini Dress" as part of its spring/summer collection. The dress, priced at £64, features an all-over ruffle design and is available in red or black. It is targeted for summer nights out, parties, or holidays abroad.

articles.title: McDonald's launches new breakfast menu in north west today
articles.summary: McDonald's is launching a new Breakfast Savers menu in north west restaurants, featuring items like a Sausage Sandwich and a Saver Bacon Roll. Customers can also purchase a Breakfast Bundle Deal, which includes a sandwich or bacon roll and a selected drink, for £2.99.

articles.title: Zalando uses AI to speed up marketing campaigns, cut costs
articles.author: Helen Reid
articles.summary: Zalando is employing generative AI to accelerate image production for its app and website, decreasing production time from weeks to days and cutting costs significantly. Additionally, Zalando is developing and using AI-generated "digital twins" of models to enhance marketing and product representation, allowing models to feature across campaigns and product pages without extensive photoshoots.

articles.title: Shoppers race to buy Kindle Fire Tablets for £13 in 86% off sale away from Amazon
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Wowcher is offering the first-generation Amazon Kindle Fire tablet for £12.99, a significant discount from its original price. This version, released in 2011, features a 7-inch touchscreen and is suitable for basic tasks like social media and web browsing. The article also mentions alternative tablets such as Samsung's A9 and Apple's 10th generation iPad.

articles.title: 3D Rendering Services Market Outlook to 2033 Emerging Technologies and Global Forecast
articles.summary: Innovative Solutions Inc. has launched enhanced 3D Rendering Services using advanced technology and expertise. The services cater to various industries, offering tailored solutions for virtual experiences and photorealistic images. The company prioritizes sustainability and serves clients globally.

articles.title: Redmi Note 14 Series: Living up to the hype
articles.author: ADVERTISEMENT
articles.summary: Xiaomi's Redmi Note 14 series is launched with the Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 chipset, enhanced low-light photography, and a durable design. The series boasts upgrades like a high-contrast curved display, improved camera lenses, and a larger battery. At XiaomiSale, the Redmi Note 14 is available, alongside the Redmi A5 and Redmi 14c.

articles.title: West Ham transfer rumours: Mohammed Kudus, Arsenal
articles.summary: BBC Sport has launched 'Ask Me Anything,' a new service designed to serve users.

articles.title: Belfast entrepreneur creates unique baby accessories inspired by ‘extra-dribbly daughter'
articles.author: Amy Cochrane
articles.summary: Olivia Williams launched 'Milk and Joy' in 2021. The company's initial product is a unique 'double bib' designed from super absorbent muslin-style fabric made of 100% cotton gauze.

articles.title: 20 Pretty Dresses From Target That'll Make Getting Ready So Much Easier
articles.author: Ellie Jane Rudy
articles.summary: Target is offering a wide array of new dresses suitable for various occasions like weddings, garden parties, office wear, and casual outings. These include maxi dresses, mini dresses, slip dresses, sweater dresses, and more, featuring different styles and fabrics such as cotton, jersey, and seersucker. Many dresses include features like pockets and are praised for their comfort and style.

articles.title: Roborock Launches Qrevo Series in Australia and New Zealand, Bringing Premium Innovation to the Mid-Range Market
articles.summary: Roborock has launched two new mid-range robot vacuum models, the Qrevo C and Qrevo L, in Australia and New Zealand. The Qrevo C is priced at $1,699 AUD and features tangle-free living, while the Qrevo L is priced at $1,499 AUD and emphasizes powerful, reliable cleaning, and both are available through Roborock's official retail channels.

articles.title: Amazon Great Summer sale ends tomorrow: Last chance to get minimum 50% off on mattresses
articles.author: Shweta Pandey
articles.summary: Several companies including Nilkamal, Springtek, Centuary, Sleepezee, JY, Wakefit, SleepyCat, The Sleep Company, Sleepsutraa, Livpure, duroflex, RESTOFIT, SleepyHug, Flo and others are offering new mattresses with various features. These mattresses offer dual comfort (hard & soft), orthopedic support, and use materials like PU foam, memory foam, latex, and pocket springs. Many come with warranties and are available in different sizes (king, queen, single).

articles.title: Women's Mini Dresses that Wow: Unmissable Deals at Myntra Fashion Carnival Sale
articles.summary: IDPL promotes checkered mini dresses, blazer-style dresses, and ethnic-inspired dresses with ruffles, highlighting the latest trends and products available for purchase. These products are available to 'Order Now'.

articles.title: Heinz scraps popular condiment with shoppers baffled by 'strange' decision
articles.author: James Rodger
articles.summary: Heinz has discontinued its tartare sauce and replaced it with a new 'Fish and Chips Sauce'. This new sauce is described as a herbier, creamier condiment made with gherkins, onions, and fragrant herbs. Heinz also offers a range of world flavor-inspired sauces, including Turkish Style Garlic Sauce and American Style Burger Sauce.

articles.title: McDonald's launches new breakfast menu in north west today
articles.author: Katie Collier
articles.summary: McDonald's is launching a new "Breakfast Savers menu" in the north of England, featuring items like a Sausage Sandwich and Saver Bacon Roll. A "Breakfast Bundle Deal" is also available for a promotional price. This launch introduces a new, value-focused breakfast option for customers in select locations.

articles.title: Crushon AI: The Only NSFW AI Image Generator That Actually Feels Real
articles.author: Crushon Ai Corp
articles.summary: Crushon.AI is launching a new feature: NSFW AI image generation. This new offering combines text-based interactions with AI-generated visuals, allowing for more immersive and tailored user engagement.

articles.title: San Francisco-based food company bringing pork alternative to stores
articles.summary: Mission Barns is launching its cell-cultivated pork alternative meatball product in San Francisco grocery stores like Sprouts and Fiorella. The company also plans to release bacon this year. This initiative follows the company's federal approval to bring its cell-cultivated pork directly to consumers.

articles.title: Crushon AI: The Only NSFW AI Image Generator That Actually Feels Real
articles.author: CRUSHON AI CORP
articles.summary: Crushon.AI has launched a new feature: NSFW AI image generation. This feature allows users to add visual enhancements to their chats. The goal is to make interactions more unique, deeper, and real with custom AI girlfriend personas and NSFW character AI scenarios.

articles.title: What Is a Mangonada & Where to Try One in Greater Palm Springs
articles.author: Derrik J. Lang
articles.summary: La Michoacana Ice Cream Parlor features the mangonada as their signature product. The mangonada is a frozen concoction with fresh mangoes blended with ice and sugar into a sorbet that's layered with streaks of Tajín and chamoy. Tajín is added to provide sour, savoriness, and spice.

articles.title: BoxLang 1.0 Launches: A Dynamic, Multi-Runtime Language Redefining the JVM
articles.summary: Ortus Solutions has launched BoxLang 1.0, a modern, open-source, multi-runtime language for the JVM designed for flexibility and scalability. BoxLang ships with modules that will help with PDF Generation, Image Manipulation, Email & FTP Support and much more.

articles.title: Dermicool soaps? Emami bets on legacy brand extensions to fuel growth
articles.author: Suneera Tandon
articles.summary: Emami Ltd is expanding its product lines by introducing new products and brand extensions. Specifically, Emami has launched soaps, cooling gels and specialized powders under the Dermicool brand, and introduced a ₹1 talcum sachet under its Navratna cooling oil brand. The company is also focusing on new product development for brands like Kesh King and Boroplus.

articles.title: Would you like to smell like a BMW? Have we got the fragrance for you
articles.summary: BMW is introducing new fragrances.

articles.title: Startup Korl unveils multimodal, multi-agent tool for custom communication across disparate systems
articles.summary: Korl launched its AI-powered platform designed to automatically generate personalized customer materials, such as QBRs and presentations, by integrating data from various sources like Salesforce and Jira. The platform uses an ensemble of models across OpenAI, Gemini, and Anthropic, selecting the best model based on speed, accuracy, and cost. This reduces deck preparation time and aims to improve net revenue retention for companies.

articles.title: TxtCart's Eerily Human-Like SMS Technology Slashes Customer Service Costs by 97%
articles.summary: TxtCart, an AI-powered SMS marketing platform, is revolutionizing customer engagement for Shopify merchants by offering round-the-clock cart recovery and real-time customer interactions, dramatically reducing customer support expenses. The platform autonomously manages full conversations, responding to customer inquiries with natural, real-time accuracy and helps Shopify brands turn text messages into personalized, high-converting conversations. Several Shopify brands such as Joyride Harness, Organic Grow Hair, Haute Home LA, and CROSSNET have seen significant revenue increases using TxtCart's SMS marketing platform.

articles.title: Roborock Debuts Qrevo Series in Australia and New Zealand
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Roborock has launched its newest mid-range robot vacuum models, the Qrevo C and Qrevo L, in Australia and New Zealand. The Qrevo C features 12,000 Pa HyperForce® suction, dual spinning mops, and a Multifunctional Dock, while the Qrevo L offers 10,000 Pa HyperForce® suction and customizable water flow levels. Both models are available through Roborock Australia's official retail channels.

articles.title: SonicWall Sets New Benchmark in Cybersecurity for MSPs with Next-Gen Solutions
articles.author: Sonic Wall
articles.summary: SonicWall has launched a suite of new products and services aimed at Managed Service Providers (MSPs). These include next-generation firewalls (NGFW) for medium-sized businesses, Managed Protection Security Services (MPSS) with 24/7 monitoring, and Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) designed to simplify operations and reduce cyber exposure. The offerings are delivered through the unified, cloud-native SonicPlatform.

articles.title: OnePlus 13S Coming To India Soon
articles.summary: OnePlus is introducing a new handset featuring a customizable function key, replacing the classic alert switch. The device includes a dual-camera system with a 50MP primary unit and a 50MP zoom-capable sensor.

articles.title: "The AI writes it on its own, so it's easy to use it because there's no pressure to post it."Carrot,..
articles.author: Lee Sunhee
articles.summary: Carrot introduces a new "used transaction AI writing" function to enhance user convenience and the transaction environment. The AI analyzes product images and automatically suggests details like product name, category, item status, and a detailed description, facilitating faster and easier posting of sales articles. Carrot also introduced the AI writing function to Carrot Canada.

articles.title: DigiKey introduces own-brand DigiKey Standard product line
articles.author: system
articles.summary: DigiKey is expanding its Standard product line, which initially launched in 2022. The expanded line will encompass kits, soldering stations, power systems, and battery holders, providing dependable tools for designing and building.

articles.title: AI Agents In The Enterprise & Their Implications For Identity Security
articles.author: Tarun Thakur
articles.summary: The article discusses the rise of AI agents and their integration into enterprise workflows. Companies like Google are introducing AI agents such as Google Agents for automating decision-making, while Goldman Sachs has developed GS AI Assistant. OpenAI and Anthropic are launching employee-managed AI agents. The use cases span software development, marketing, customer support and supply chain management.

articles.title: Netflix Reveals Big Overhaul, Here's What's Coming And When
articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.summary: Netflix is launching a significant UI update for its TV interface, beginning May 19th. The update includes easier navigation with shortcuts to key sections, personalized recommendations based on viewing habits, a 'My Netflix' hub for managing watchlists, and detailed title information on the homepage, all designed to streamline the viewing experience.

articles.title: Samsung Teases New Galaxy S25 Edge Discount Before Launch
articles.author: Janhoi Mcgregor
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing the upcoming Galaxy S25 Edge with a pre-release discount offer, providing voucher codes to registered users and a discount for those who pay a reservation fee. This promotion aims to attract buyers to the new ultra-slim phone, with potential aggressive pricing to compete in the market.

articles.title: Figma's big AI update takes on Adobe, WordPress, and Canva
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Figma introduced four new products at its Config event. These include software for website building, AI coding, branded marketing, and digital illustration. The aim is to provide a more complete creative software ecosystem within Figma itself.

articles.title: The Daily Snort Launches as the Internet's Funniest and Least Credible News Source
articles.author: system
articles.summary: The Daily Snort, a satire news website, has launched. Henry Strickland founded the website as Editor-in-Chief to deliver fake headlines and journalistic tomfoolery.

articles.title: Amazon arms warehouses with Vulcan, an AI-powered robot with a sense of touch
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Amazon launched Vulcan, its first robot with a sense of touch, at a fulfillment center in Dortmund, Germany. Vulcan's deployment, unveiled during the 'Delivering the Future' event, aims to enhance picking and stowing processes.

articles.title: Digital clones of real models are revolutionizing fashion advertising
articles.author: system
articles.summary: SpreeAI is launching a new virtual, AI-powered try-on service, aiming to redefine the retail experience. The service is curated by experts in technology and fashion.

articles.title: LinkedIn's new AI search tool lets you describe your ideal job
articles.author: system
articles.summary: LinkedIn is launching a new generative AI tool designed to enhance job searching capabilities. This tool enables users to find job listings by using natural language descriptions of their ideal roles. The platform's updated AI-powered search bar then provides relevant job posting results.

articles.title: From synthetic data to AI agents, new SAS Viya innovations boost speed, productivity and trust Français
articles.author: system
articles.summary: SAS announced its latest offerings on the SAS Viya platform. These new data and AI offerings aim to scale and galvanize human productivity and decision-making. SAS is evolving its strategy to embrace a broader ecosystem of user personas and technologies within an enterprise's AI technology stack.

articles.title: Announcing the ASUS Chromebook CX14/CX15 Series, Now Available in the United States
articles.author: system
articles.summary: ASUS introduced a new Chromebook series featuring a stylish and eco-conscious design. The series also offers a Chromebook Plus option designed for enhanced performance.

articles.title: Xbox handheld photos leak, showing off Asus-made Project Kennan
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Asus is developing an Xbox-branded handheld device. Leaked photos of this upcoming device have surfaced online, suggesting a potential product launch is imminent.

articles.title: AI as a Service Market Size & Trends Projected to Hit $91.20 billion by 2030 ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Microsoft, IBM, Google, AWS, OpenAI, NVIDIA, Salesforce, Oracle, SAP, and HPE are active in the AI as a Service market. These companies offer services including Chatbots & AI Agents, ML Frameworks, APIs, No Code/Low Code Tools, and Data Labeling. The service types include ML as a Service and NLP as a Service.

articles.title: ServiceNow looks to take on Salesforce with its new AI agent-infused CRM
articles.author: system
articles.summary: ServiceNow has updated its CRM platform with a new AI-powered twist. The update enhances the CRM's contextual awareness capabilities.

articles.title: Netflix unveils new TV experience with GenAI search and AI-based recommendations
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Netflix unveiled a new TV experience. This experience features generative AI search, AI-based recommendations, and an enhanced design.

articles.title: Nkure - Crispr Therapeutics partner to co-develop off-the-shelf CAR-T therapy
articles.author: system
articles.summary: NKure-Crispr's product, CTX112, aims to be a pioneering offering in its field.

articles.title: An AI-driven ‘Fix it' button is just what Windows needs
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Microsoft previewed upcoming Windows AI experiences. They also showcased a smaller Surface Laptop and Surface Pro.

articles.title: Netflix Unveils AI-Powered Search Tool for Personalized Recommendations
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Netflix introduced a new AI-powered search tool designed to improve user experience in discovering content. This update is part of a broader redesign of Netflix's TV and mobile experience, focusing on speed and ease of use.

articles.title: Amazon unveils hi-tech robots that could replace huge numbers of warehouse workers
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Amazon announced the introduction of Vulcan, a cutting-edge robot. Vulcan features a human-like sense of touch, representing a fundamental leap in robotics.

articles.title: Virtual-only couture emerges as sustainable alternative for fashion industry
articles.author: system
articles.summary: SpreeAI is launching a virtual AI-powered try-on service designed to redefine retail experiences. The service is curated by professionals in the tech and fashion industries.

articles.title: Review: This Portable Controller Is the Perfect On the Go Gaming Accessory
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Crkd has introduced the Neo S, a small controller. The controller offers reasonable pricing and some distinct characteristics.

articles.title: From synthetic data to AI agents, new SAS Viya innovations boost speed, productivity and trust
articles.author: system
articles.summary: SAS introduced new data and AI offerings on the SAS Viya platform. These advancements aim to scale and improve human productivity and decision-making by embracing a broader ecosystem within enterprise AI technology.

articles.title: Wix just opened the door to quicker and easier coding with new AI tool
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Wix has introduced the Wix Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server. This new product is built for designers and website owners.

articles.title: Glacier Fresh Launches Industry-First Eco Filtration Line, Reinvents Water Purification Through Global Partnerships
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Glacier Fresh, a water purification innovator, launched a new product. The announcement was made public on May 7, 2025, in New York, NY.

articles.title: Google confirms Android 16's useful new battery health tools will skip older Pixel phones
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Google will hold an Android Show at I/O 2025. This special event is held ahead of the company's annual event. The Android Show will likely introduce new Android features and updates.

articles.title: Netflix Rolls Out AI Search Tool to Help Users Find Shows Faster
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Netflix is introducing a new AI-powered search tool to understand natural language, simplifying show and movie discovery. The company is also refreshing the look and layout of its app.

articles.title: Shoaib Ibrahim Breaks Silence On Dipika Kakar's Clothing Brand Shutting Down
articles.author: system
articles.summary: An unnamed brand offers alternative summer clothing options for people who dislike sweating and traditional summer apparel. This suggests a focus on innovative materials or designs aimed at comfort and sweat management during warmer months.

articles.title: Samsung launches two smart washing machines
articles.author: Business Desk
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Bangladesh has launched two new washing machines: the WA95CG, a 9.5-kilogram top load washer, and the WW90DG, a 9-kilogram front load washer with Ai technology. These washing machines feature innovative technology and user-centric designs.
